revised_title: Neuroptera Insects of the Krakatau Islands, Indonesia
tldr: The authors conducted a study on the Neuroptera insects of the Krakatau Islands, Indonesia. They discovered one new species of Coniopterygidae and recorded representatives of Berothidae and Hemerobiidae for the first time on the islands. The study provides insights into the diverse Indonesian fauna and the unique position of the Krakatau Islands in the field of biology.
